description:
During the 2020 election cycle, Biden threatened to take Trump behind the gym to do God knows what. In this election cycle, he now wants to go swimming with Trump, to once again do God knows what.

Biden pathetically attempted to give a speech about jobs he probably shipped to China and it went worse than you thought.


A deeply unwell, angry Biden threatens President Trump: "I'd like to take that guy for a swim out there" pic.twitter.com/ygsJze8Z6g
— RNC Research (@RNCResearch)
title: "I'd like to take that guy for a swim out there:" Biden Threatens Trump In Most Bizarre Way

description:

‘Police intelligence has determined that a group of gang members are hiding in the 10 de neighborhood, in San Marcos, San Salvador Sur.
Today, in the early hours of the morning, we have established a security fence throughout the colony,… pic.twitter.com/nc7ryaa0eo

title: Gang Members “used threats and coercion to control” Tenants In Aurora: Report

description:
The captain of the University of Nevada’s women’s volleyball team is speaking out after school officials victim blamed her team, claiming they lacked an understanding of the most basic science after the players forfeited a game where they would have competed against a man.

Sia Liilii claimed the players feared for their physical safety, which is why they forfeited a match against San Jose State. However, it turns out the school would rather uplift the patriarchy as they are complacent in destroying the rights of girls and women everywhere, by victim-blaming them as if they did something wrong.


"It's important for the future of women's sports."

Nevada volleyball's Sia Liilii on the team's reasoning for not participating in their match again
title: 'It's For The Future Of Women's Sports": Volleyball Captain Blast School Dismissing Concerns About Playing Against Dudes

description:

There has been a lot of controversy concerning comedians and presidential candidates out on these streets this week. And at the top of the list is... Joe Rogan. Rogan FINALLY sat down with Donald Trump for the podcast experience we the people have been crying out for. Though you may or may not be able to find it on YouTube, it is there if you search really hard for it. And wasn't Kamala Harris supposed to cut it up with him? Rogan addressed all these topics on X-Twitter.

Joe dropped his podcast on X to address concerns about being able to find it.
title: Joe Rogan addresses YouTube censoring Trump interview, TRUTH about Kamala Harris's appearance

description:
